content: PPH SD Zi Self-drilling framing screws Pan-head interior metal framing screw (zinc-plated) for fastening stud to track ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling Lightning Tip – upgraded to be Hilti’s fastest, most reliable interior framing screws Extra-robust – built specifically to resist head breakage and tip burn, saving you wasted screws Faster drilling speed – sharpened tips help the screws to efficiently pierce metal Better drywall finish – reduced head stand-off makes it easier to create a flush surface without rework Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Applications Fastening metal studs to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) Fastening wire lath to drywall track (max. combined thickness 0.104 inch) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Pan head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Pan head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 2297631 - Drywall screw 7x7/16 PPH SD FRMR ZN 02 - Package Size 10000 pc - 3700844 - 7x7/16 PPH SD FRMR ZN 02 - 1/2 PAL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 240000x Drywall screw 7x7/16 PPH SD FRMR ZN 02 - 3700843 - 7x7/16 PPH SD FRMR ZN 02 - PAL - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 480000x Drywall screw 7x7/16 PPH SD FRMR ZN 02
